alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 5:51PM EST until December 14 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Western Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... South central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 515 PM CST. * At 450 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 11 miles west of Panama City Beach, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Bay and south central Walton Counties, including the following locations... Laird and Inlet Beach. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
